Package fun.connor.lighter.declarative

Annotations for declarative application modeling.

See: Description

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Body
    Binds the value of the annotated parameter to the request body
    Delete
    Identifies the annotated method as an endpoint handler that responds to HTTP DELETE requests.
    Get
    Identifies the annotated method as an endpoint handler that responds to HTTP GET requests
    Post
    Identifies the annotated method as an endpoint handler that responds to HTTP POST requests
    ProducesRequestGuard
    Identifies a RequestGuardFactory as producing a specific RequestGuard type for the application.
    Put
    Identifies the annotated method as an endpoint handler that responds to HTTP PUT requests
    QueryParams
    Defines bindings for request query parameters to endpoint handler method parameters.
    ResourceController
    Identifies the annotated class as a Resource Controller.

Package fun.connor.lighter.declarative Description

Annotations for declarative application modeling. These annotations provide the core API for lighter. Includes annotations for describing endpoints, describing resource controllers, and declaring request guard factories.

Lighter's declarative API is similar in some respects to the JAX-RS declarative API. However, Lighter's API has far fewer annotations and is capable of properly describing applications of similar (if not greater) complexity.

Lighter's declarative API attempts to be unobtrusive. Thus, the API avoids verbose constructs like parameter-targeted annotations whenever possible.
